## TextInputBuilderOptions.prompt property

Prompt string shown before the input.

**Signature:**

```typescript
prompt?: string;
```

## Remarks

Displayed at the start of the input line. Uses `promptStyle` for styling. Common examples: `'> '`<!-- -->, `'$ '`<!-- -->, or `'Name: '`<!-- -->.
